full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA'I SNGON 'GRO SA CHOG DANG LHAG GNAS KYI LAG LEN GSAL BAR BKOD PA PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @022A *, ,(CES BCOM LDAN 'DAS PADMA DBANG CHEN RTA MGRIN YANG GSANG KHROS PA'I DKYIL 'KHOR GYI CHO GA'I SNGON 'GRO SA CHOG DANG LHAG GNAS KYI LAG LEN GSAL BAR BKOD PA PHAN BDE'I 'BYUNG GNAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, ^BSTAN 'GRO'I DPAL MNON DAM PA CHOS KYI RGYAL PO MKHAN CHEN MCHOG SPRUL RIN PO CHES, LAG LEN GSAL ZHING 'KHYER BDE BA'I YI GE BRIS SHIG PAR BKA' STZAL BA DANG, DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS KYANG BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, DPAL LDAN BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI BKA' 'BANGS KYI THA SHAL BA, ^BTZUN GZUGS DAM TSIG RDO RJES, SGYU 'PHRUL GYI GZHUNG RNAMS DANG, BLA CHEN CHOS DPAL BA'I LEGS BSHAD SOGS SPYI SGOS KYI GZHUNG LUGS DU MAR RANG BLOS GANG BSOBS KYIS ZHIB TU DPYAD DE, DON GYI DGONGS PA DANG MI 'GAL ZHING 'JUG PA BDE BA GTZO BOR BYAS TE NYE BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI, DAD BRTZON RNAM DPYOD KYI DPAL DANG LDAN PA RAB 'BYAMS SMRA BA BLO BZANG BSTAN DAR GYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN PA'I RGYUN GYUR CIG , ,,)
